SKT_FIRST.name: Theory Refutation
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks 2 enemies. When an enemy is defeated, recovers Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>. This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵2体にダメージを与える。敵を倒した時、自分のHPを<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>回復する。\nこのスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 2인을 공격합니다. 적 처치 시 자신의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 회복합니다.\n이 스킬은 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击2名敌人。\n击杀敌人时,自身生命值恢复<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。\n该技能根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Inflicts reduced Critical Damage for 2 turns (Ignores the target's Resilience)\nIncreases Damage
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 対象の会心ダメージDOWN-2ターン\n(対象の効果抵抗無視)\nダメージUP
SKT_BURST_1.effect_kr: 대상 치명 피해 -2턴(대상 효과 저항 무시)\n피해 증가
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 目标暴击伤害-2回合\n(无视目标效果抵抗)\n伤害提升

SKT_BURST_3.effect: <color=#FFBF00>Enhanced Attack</color>\nIncreases Damage\nRight after using this skill, does not trigger Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp:
<color=#FFBF00>強化攻撃</color>
ダメージUP
このスキルでは敵の
反撃/復讐/迅速対応が発動不可
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: <color=#FFBF00>강화 공격</color>\n피해 증가\n해당 스킬 직후 반격/복수/신속 대응 불가
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: <color=#FFBF00>强化攻击</color>\n伤害提升\n该技能后不会触发反击/复仇/迅速应对

SKT_SECOND.name: Disassembly Analysis
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) After attacking an enemy, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, and after defeating an enemy, increases Priority by an additional <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.

(Triggered Effect) When an ally other than the caster performs an attack that targets all enemies, steals <color=#28d9ed>1</color> buff(s) from the enemy with the highest Max Health and then attacks the target. (Ignores the target's Resilience.)
This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果)カレンが敵に攻撃後、自分の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせる。敵を倒した場合、行動ゲージが追加で<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPする。

(発動効果)自分を除く味方が全体攻撃時、最大HPが最も高い敵単体の強化効果を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>奪った後、対象にダメージを与える。(対象の効果抵抗無視)
このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) 카렌이 적을 공격 후 자신의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가시키고, 적 처치 후 추가로 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>를 증가시킵니다.

(발동 효과) 자신을 제외한 아군이 전체 공격 시 최대 체력이 가장 높은 적의 강화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 빼앗은 후, 대상을 공격합니다. (대상의 효과 저항 무시)
이 스킬은 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(被动效果)卡伦攻击敌人后,使自身行动值提升<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>,并在击杀敌人后额外提升<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

(触发效果)除自身外的友军发动全体攻击时,夺取生命值上限最高敌人的<color=#28d9ed>1个</color>强化效果后,攻击目标。(无视目标效果抵抗)
该技能根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Final Cleanup
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies.
This skill's damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and ignores <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.

<color=#ffd732>When attacking Irregular Monsters</color>, it ignores <color=#28d9ed>all</color> of the target's Defense and reduces all of Caren's Skill Cooldowns by <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp:
敵全体にダメージを与える。
このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>に比例してダメージがUPし、対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>無視する。

<color=#ffd732>イレギュラーモンスター</color>攻撃時、対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>すべて</color>無視し、カレンのすべてのスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>減少する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
적 전체를 공격합니다.
이 스킬은 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가하며, 대상의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 무시합니다.

<color=#ffd732>이레귤러 몬스터</color> 공격 시 대상의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>모두</color> 무시하며, 카렌의 모든 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 감소합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh:
攻击全体敌人。
该技能根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害,且无视目标<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>的防御力。

攻击<color=#ffd732>异型怪怪物</color>时,<color=#28d9ed>完全</color>无视目标防御力,并使卡伦所有技能的冷却时间降低<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack, and after attacking, reduces skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Final Cleanup</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> instead of Attack.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:自分のチェーンスキルが攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>【最終定理】</color>のスキルターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>DOWNさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 자신의 스킬 체인 공격이 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가하며, 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>마지막 정리</color> 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh:
<color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升自身连携技能攻击的伤害,且攻击后使<color=#28d9ed>最后整理</color>的技能冷却时间减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:根据<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>而非攻击力等比提升
伤害。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
